item.title: Israel Is Expanding Its Gaza City Operation, but Where Does It Stand?
item.description: The Israeli government is widening its operation in Gaza despite its generals’ advice and as it deliberates on a new cease-fire proposal.

item.title: Map: 7.5-Magnitude Earthquake Strikes the South Atlantic Ocean
item.description: View the location of the quake’s epicenter and shake area.

item.title: Thaksin Shinawatra, Former Thai Premier, Cleared of Insulting Monarchy
item.description: But the reprieve for Thaksin Shinawatra, who remains a political force, did not mean that the legal troubles for him and his family were over.

item.title: Friday Briefing: U.S. and Europe Flesh Out Trade Deal
item.description: Also, a war photographer’s return to Afghanistan.

item.title: Large Earthquake Strikes Drake Passage Near Argentina and Chile
item.description: The epicenter of the 7.5-magnitude quake was in the Drake Passage, a body of water between the southernmost tip of South America and Antarctica.
